name: Capital Ring link to Boston Manor underground station

ai.summary: A short, easy 1.8 km section of the Capital Ring around Boston Manor Underground Station in London. It makes for a quick urban stroll that combines parkland paths with light street sections, suitable for beginners, families, or a lunchtime wander.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat and well-surfaced: paved paths through parks, along green corridors, and some pavement along streets. Gentle gradients in park areas; expect mixed surfaces and curb crossings.
ai.safety_notes: Urban route safety: be mindful of traffic at crossings and on shared paths. Stay on designated paths, watch for cyclists and other pedestrians, and keep valuables secure. Daylight or good lighting is advised; wear proper footwear and be prepared for weather changes.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with spring and autumn offering especially pleasant weather; be prepared for rain and shorter daylight in winter.
